SELECT IFNULL(SUM(p.payAmount),0) FROM payHistory p inner join reserve r ON p.reserveId = r.reserveId WHERE p.storeId = #{storeId} and r.statusCodeId IN(4,5);
SELECT count(*) FROM payHistory p inner join reserve r ON p.reserveId = r.reserveId WHERE p.storeId = #{storeId} and r.statusCodeId IN (4,5)
